Development of Flatty¶

Preparing packaging and distribution¶

Test everything¶

in the shell:

cd doc
make doctest

cd src/flatty/tests
python __init__.py

Change Version¶

Change the version in src/flatty/__init__.py Add changelog in CHANGELOG

Commit and Tag¶

in the shell:

cd doc
make clean

python setup.py clean

git commit -a
git tag -a vX.X.X
git push --tags
